website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly toner with mild purifiers to remove impurities that works for all skin tones.
pros: This formula is non-comedogenic, oil-free, and hypoallergenic
It evens out your complexion and helps prevent breakouts
cons: Isn't as lightweight as some other toners

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: My wife ya gone through like15 or 20 bottles of this stuff over the past few years, and she’s quite particular about skin stuff...very sensitive skin. So, that’s about as good an endorsement as you can get, considering the source of my information. Buy with confidence. If it suits my wife, it most likely won’t disappoint you either.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Ridenhour

customer_reviews.title: Unsanitary and OPENED
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this is supposed to come. But the bottle was open! No sanitary lid. No plastic. No cover! Nothing! Very sketchy! I have no idea who could have put some dirty thing in there!! Definitely debating returning it. Because I am not putting that thing on my face!
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I wish I had started using it sooner. I added it to my new daily skincare routine and after just a few days, my face looks and feels so much better. I have redness on my cheeks and nose thanks to the starting of rosacea, and I'm usually very sensitive to anything applied to my face. This toner soothes my skin after cleansing, smells great, and makes my skin feel amazing. I moisturize with Neutrogena's oil free moisturizer after and it seems to be a winning combo with my picky skin. I wish I knew about this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It may be alcohol free, but it contains perfume...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very... unique toner. It’s not necessarily bad, but it’s very different than what I’m used to. I most often use a witch hazel toner with alcohol. I read that I should try a non-alcohol toner to perhaps soothe my skin, so I purchased this one. It suds up when you rub it between your hands, which was very off putting. It definitely leaves my skin more moisturized. I use a 50/50 combo of this toner and witch hazel, the best of both worlds shine though. Still a little iffy about how it contains perfume, since that’s known to dry out skin.
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Alcohol free so it won't dry out your skin
customer_reviews.text: My new toner. I've long had a bottle of Neutrogena's Pore Refining toner which worked really well but decided to try this alcohol-free formula now that my aging skin is drier. I love it! Instead of making my face feel dry and tight it feels smooth and almost silky. A little goes a long way, too. It's jusr0t a small part of my face cleansing/conditioning routine but an important one!
customer_reviews.author: peasantmama

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toner. Not having alcohol is a great bonus. This is very well priced and works wonders. I have oily skin and using an alcohol product just makes it worse. This helps remove the last bits of makeup the cleansing cloths don't remove and really does seem to normalize the PH in the skin and not make my face so oily so quickly. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: My 98-year-old mom uses everyday
customer_reviews.text: My mom asked me to order a few things for her due to COVID. She wanted this. She's 98 in the photo. No work done. She said she uses this every morning. I ordered my own bottle. It is nice, doesn't dry out my skin and has a nice mellow scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best skincare brands and least costly toners!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Neutrogena products, but their toner is 🔥🔥🔥🔥 If you are consistently using daily (🌞 & 🌛), like I have been doing, you will see that your pores minimize, have clearer skin, and it leaves your face glowing & your skin feeling so soft & subtle! Now, I do swap back & forth with the Dickinson's brand toner & Pixi's glow tonic, which Pixi's glow tonic is by far my absolute fave! So if you can't afford that brand, these are the next best in toners 😉✨✨✨
customer_reviews.author: Katrina A Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toner for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have SUPER sensitive, oily/combination skin and this toner didn't burn at all! It smells nice and feels good to apply fresh out of the shower. I love neutrogena products and they're super great for me and this toner is sensitive enough for my skin :-)
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Not Packaged Safely
customer_reviews.text: I would have kept this item to try because I like Neutrogena products; however, there was no seal or plastic wrap on the two bottles I purchased. I am returning them. There should be a seal on any product like this for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: SMW7

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not sealed
customer_reviews.text: Without proper sealing, who knows what's in the bottle. I do not feel comfortable using a liquid product for my face that could have been tampered with. I'm not saying that it has been tampered with, but that it should be appropriately sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Dagny

customer_reviews.title: Possibly fake
customer_reviews.text: Came with 1/4 bottle empty. No safety seal. Pretty sure this is a fake. Will not be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Aschutte

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this product should’ve been sealed, but it was open and leaking :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toner I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have what I consider normal skin, but always ad trouble finding a good toner. Most toners I tried including Thayer's Witch Hazel, Apple Cider Vinegar, Neutrogena always left my skin feeling very dry and tight. I finally found Boots No7 Beautiful Skin Toner for Normal Skin. Ufortunately, it was discontinued. I tried this on a whim and it's great! I LOVE the smell (almost like baby powder), it leaves me skin feeling very refereshed and moisturized, no dryness or tightness at all! This will be my go to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: It is fragranced!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a huge fan of Neutrogena products but I don't plan on repurchasing this. I have sensitive skin and it doesn't cause me to break out. I just didn't expect it to have as strong of a smell as it does. It is fragranced, which I didn't expect. Not a bad smell, just not for me. Also does the same job as the micellar water.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Van Winkle

customer_reviews.title: It must be expired products of knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Very upset , hope seller send me a replacement . This product was proven safe by quality I use for many years . The water runs into a tiny bits of white dusks upon application on skin . This is surely a fake Side more than an expired one , this can’t be true for neutrogena .
customer_reviews.author: Maika

customer_reviews.title: Gentle toner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toner. I use it after washing my face and it makes my face feel refreshed and gently moisturized.. It's not drying at all and doesn't strip my skin like other old fashioned tonerrs that I've used in the past. I'm 46 and this leaves my skin feeling and looking rejuvenated. It's gentle and that's what my skin needs right now. I have been using it for two months and I go through one bottle a month.
customer_reviews.author: C. WallaceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle and i still love it. It has helped me to get less breakouts and I never knew how much residual makeup was left behind when i washed my face. This gets it all and makes my face feel cleaner. Even if all I have the energy to do is take my makeup off, I always follow up with this.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted
customer_reviews.text: Beyond disgusted with my experience. I can’t even use the product since it has been clearly used. It came broken and dirty. I have photos but no where to upload them....
customer_reviews.author: erykah

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the other inexpensive toners!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a toner on the fly when I couldn’t go to Sephora to buy mine during the pandemic and was super impressed. I have combination super dry very sensitive skin and am always worried about trying new and especially cheap products but this was a win all around. It’s the perfect addition to any skincare routine if you don’t already use toner after cleansing. Smells amazing, takes off all the extra dirt and skin while still being super gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true (and affordable)
customer_reviews.text: We’re both fans of Neutrogena products and have been since we were in college because they were always affordable and easy to find. This toner, in particular, is a product we have been using for a very (very... don’t ask) long time for those same reasons. There are more expensive toners on the market that we can buy at the beauty counters but this affordable Neutrogena toner works to freshen skin and shrink pores without the bite of alcohol and the bite of those beauty counter prices. Why spend more when we can still buy a tried and true product for about half (or less!) than other brands?
customer_reviews.author: Shibaguyz

customer_reviews.title: Great for all skin types!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different toners in the past but some of them dried out my skin more due to the alcohol. This one is awesome and the scent is amazing! It's a clean, fresh scent but it's not strong or overpowering by any means. My husband started using it too and he also really likes it. We have completely opposite skin types (his is oily and acne prone, mine is dry) but it has worked well for us both. We'll probably continue to purchase this since we've both enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I never knew about toner, but I’m I gave ...
customer_reviews.text: I never knew about toner, but I’m I gave it a shot. This has really closed my pores and has almost completely eliminated blemishes for me. I put it on using a cotton ball every morning. I can’t stand when my face feels greasy and since this stuff is alcohol free, it doesn’t feel dry or greasy, it just soaks right in within a few minutes. Necessity!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works magic!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had clear skin my entire life. I’ve fortunately been spared acne or any skin blemishes. Cue peri-menopause at 49 and I’m getting these little, angry cysts on my face. Ugh! I’ve started using this toner after I wash my face before bed and after my morning shower. The cysts have cleared up (like magic - within two days) and no new ones have returned. My skin feels great and soft. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LidoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This may work well for others but as someone who has sensitive skin and breaks out easy it is not for me. The scent is good but strong and I think that’s why my skin doesn’t like it. It felt fine on my skin but I broke out after using it, again I blame my skin but wish this was scent free
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Is my bottles opened???
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today and I used it right after I took a shower. I love it because it feels gentle on my skin. This is my first try by the way. And when I am applying it, I realized I did not took any plastic cover on the lid or plastic seal to my bottle!!! It is not sealed and there is no any protection whatsoever!!! Was this opened? It is full but there is no guarantee this product is new. Now, I’m not comfortable using it. I hope Amazon would clarify me. This is the first time I had issues with product being delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Raya Grace

customer_reviews.title: Fix the packing!
customer_reviews.text: I had the opportunity to try this product before buying it and I really liked it because it didn’t break me out. However, Im giving 4 instead of 5 because it was leaking when I received it. It doesn’t have a safety seal. It didn’t leak a lot but I saw more reviews talking about the same issue and they haven’t fixed this problem yet? A little bit of tape when packing it won’t hurt...
customer_reviews.author: Lilipau23

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out!
customer_reviews.text: I do not ever get acne and I’ve been like this for my whole life. This stuff made me break out like crazy. After a week my skin is still irritated and rash like looking. Also dried out my skin A LOT. And I have really oily skin. It also makes my skin feel sticky after. The only thing I liked about it is that it smells really nice. I would not buy again nor recommend to anyone else. Bottle is in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Alcohol and oil free is just what I needed in a toner that doubles as an quick face freshener before makeup and also after washng my face. Always can trust Neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Your Face!
customer_reviews.text: I will not use any other product when it comes to using a toner for my skin. Soft and gentle- great results. This will not dry out your skin so that it flakes and burns. It’s gentle fresh liquid cleanses and tones, and helps with oily spots or breakouts. It smells so good as it cools your skin. I Highly Recommend Neutrogena’s Alcohol-Free Toner!
customer_reviews.author: ~ Deck The Halls ~

customer_reviews.title: Broke out like crazy
customer_reviews.text: My skin has never been clear and I was hoping starting a whole new skin car routine would solve the problem. However, when I started using this my skin broke out HORRIBLY. I know it was this product that was making my skin so bad because my skin cleared about 3 days after I stopped using it. It left my face feeling super dry and like it had sucked away all the moisture, too. The only thing good about this product (for me personally) is that is smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Ally L

customer_reviews.title: So Fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. This is the first toner I’ve ever used and I selected it because it does not contain alcohol. Man, I never realized what I was missing, toner(especially this one) has done wonders for my skin. It has helped boost my daily moisturizer as well as even out my skin tone around my nose and upper cheeks. The smell is so fresh and clean I wish I could splash it on my face every morning instead of water haha. With daily morning / nightly use the bottle last me about 5 weeks. For the price I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Moss

customer_reviews.title: Not for every type of skin
customer_reviews.text: The brand neutrogena seemed a good brand itself so I feel so much disappointed after using this toner. It came opened, a bit empty without sealing. Strange! After few weeks of its use I started having acne problems. I Am not teenager I am 30 years old ! I stopped using toner and my skin got better. I am not sure it’s just my skin reaction so I would say it’s not for everyone. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Flower

customer_reviews.title: Welcome addition to my facial routine...
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a different toner but found that it dried out my face and stopped using it. After researching again and found the reviews helpful on this particular brand, I tried it again. I have sensitive skin as does my daughter and we both tried this toner again. Very happy with the results and our skins feels and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toner for gentle but effective cleansing of skin
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gentle toner for girls getting into skincare and young adult women. I have notmal to combination skin so I used this for years. Smells very neutral and pleasant. Feels light but hydrating. Has no sensations or tingle to the skin if that's something that worries you. Take a lot of dirt off the skin, definitely more on the alkaline side feel wise on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: goldengirl

customer_reviews.title: Must have for extremely sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about purchasing this toner, but I am so glad that I did. I have extremely sensitive skin and use Tretinoin. Every toner I have used has caused my skin to become extremely irritated, hot and red. But not this bad boy! My skin feels so smooth and refreshed after using it. I can’t believe I’ve been missing out on this stuff for years!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to sound like an infomercial. Stop wasting money on other toners. This is literally the one and only that you need. It tones, leaves moisture and goes above and beyond. It works on all skin types including super sensitive. I have to agree with Jeffree Star on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jenocidal

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the scent of this product, it's light and it doesn't linger, but it isn't unpleasant either. I've also found that a little bit goes a long way, so I feel like I'm getting my money's worth. After using it regularly for a few weeks, I've found that my skin is so much happier and softer, and it isn't as greasy or red.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Olson

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and it is soothing.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. It is soft but so refreshing. Don't worry if you don't like scented products though, it fades within minutes and isn't chemically. It is also so light and soothing and doesn't make my pores feel clogged or irritated. I took one star off because although I use it everyday, I haven't noticed a drastic difference in my skin. I don't know, but I just love using this anyway because it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with this toner!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light on the skin. It does not feel harsh and had no bad reaction when using this. Love the subtle fresh scent it has. It has been over two month now and definitely help change my overall appearance and feeling of my face. I have started taking care more of my skin basically a new facial routine. Face wash —-> toner—> antioxidant serum —-> eye cream —-> moisturizer —-> facial sunscreen (daytime).
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly healthy product!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product - It's super soft on my skin as it nourishes and moisturizes my skin at the same time. It has such a mild scent and drys off in 1-2 mins and feels so fresh before going to bed. I use this product every time I use makeup. After removing my makeup, I use a cotton ball to dab it over my face. However, the only downside to this product is their packaging - I wish they used a more efficient way to pack it. A spray bottle would have been so nice to use. I hate to find a cotton bottle before I can use this product. Other than that, wonderful product! Hats off!!
customer_reviews.author: Kena P.

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance overpowers
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin this is NOT for you. There is so much fragrance in this product (which doesn’t even belong in skin care products for your face to begin with) it was overwhelming. My face did feel soft after but I did get a breakout most likely from the scent. I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective- my favorite toner
customer_reviews.text: A favorite product of mine that I was having problems finding locally in stores. Great for both dry areas and oily patches. I use it almost every day, once a day. It's a great toner to put on after shaving (male) and before applying after shave balm. I use several other Neutrogena products, their liquid face soap or men's face wash in a tube. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this alcohol-free facial toner after washing my face with acne wash and before applying face moisturizer. This toner doesn't dry out my face like other ones I've tried has and it really helps my skin. I use it every morning and it doesn't cause any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product...No Tamper Plastic Seal!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. So far, so good. My biggest concern is that the bottle comes with absolutely no tamper plastic seal! I was tempted to return the product once I received in in the mail. Neutrogena, if you are reading this message, you need to add some kind of protective seal for the bottle before you ship it to your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncoholic

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite toner. Great for sensitive skin! Bonus is it's alcohol free! From using high end to drug store brands, this is by far my favorite & I will purchase again. The scent is very light & so refreshing. You'll love it if you give it a try. Price is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin after the shower
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have super high hopes when I bought this to replace a more expensive toner, but I'm pleasantly surprised this has worked well! I use this right after exfoliating and moisturizes my skin. It leaves my face feeling soft and hydrated and has a pleasant smell to it, which isn't too fragrant. Since it's alcohol free, it also doesn't sting my face. Will be buying more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I have read so much about this toner and buy it very excited. But I don't really feel it is special. It's a very simple formulation, my skin feels more refresh after using it but that's all. If you like basic products this is for you, my skin is mature and needs more nutritive ingredients, I'll look for another kind of toner.
customer_reviews.author: Ninna

customer_reviews.title: Caused a Burning Sensation for Several Months after Discontinuing Use
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure this stuff ruined my face for a while there. Soon after using it, my face became extremely sensitive, something I've never suffered from before. Even washing my face with the most gentle of face washes or putting on sunscreen caused a strong burning and tingling sensation. It took me several months of moisturizing my face more than normal to get my face back to normal. I do not trust this product, and would not try it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Nothing To Complain About.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. I believe the description is accurate, and the price is better than Walmart's pricing. I can't complain, but I dropped one star because I'm not sure "toner" isn't a hyped product altogether. I think I use this toner based on a habit. Any opinions?
customer_reviews.author: NeilzEyez

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to add a toner to my skin regime. I already spend so much on lotions and serums that I was hoping I could cheap out a little on toner. Apparently I was right! This stuff is not drying but does a good job of cleaning my skin. I dont really have acne anymore, so I can't speak on the effectiveness of clearing up breakouts. However my skin feels clean and not irritated after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Refreshes without drying out.
customer_reviews.text: No fuss toner that I apply before I use any other skin care products. I transferred it to a spray bottle and lightly spray my face before I apply a serum. It doesn't dry and that makes this a keeper. My aestician suggested adding a toner to my regimen as it balance the pH and refreshes the skin in addition to helping bind moisturizers to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.R.

customer_reviews.title: Best toner!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. My favorite toner I’ve ever tried by far. It is alcohol free so it does not burn the skin. My skin is also very sensitive and it does not irritate. Applied with cotton ball it clears the dirt, dead skin, and remaining makeup from your face and pores. I use every night before bed. It is moisturizing and helps balance the face’s pH. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Ritchie-Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Less acne
customer_reviews.text: I have a very sensitive skin and was having problems with acne. I’ve been using this for a week and have seen positive improvements. My face is not as oily and my acne has subsided. My face looks clearer and brighter. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toner I was a little hesitant being that it was alcohol free and I wasn't sure how it would clean my skin, but it does. It feels like water but it works like magic. I love the product and I recommend it to anyone who is looking for a toner that won't strip your skin of your natural oils
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: nice toner
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toner at a GREAT price. I use this is my skin routine after cleansing my face and I think it helps to remove excess dirt or whatever is left on my face and makes it ready for my next skin care step! Mine did not come with a protective seel and I dont think its supposed to, so dont be alarmed when it doesnt have one.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Product was open in the box
customer_reviews.text: Product came in open and it was leaking in the box.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Drying. Irritating.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the worst toner I've ever seen. My skin is very sensitive, and I know when something is wrong because of this right away. My skin became red right away and VERY dry. At first I thought maybe it wasn't the product, but after a few tries, and a worsening condition if my skin, I knew it was the product. If you have sensitive, combo, acne-prone skin, like me, DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Katya

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this toner for several months now and I love it! It's so smooth and refreshing, moisturizing. My skin doesn't feel tight nor dry nor irritated afterwards. I would highly recommend this toner to anyone, even those with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: I love this toner. No tingling or burning on my sensitive skin. Just a perfect cooling clean. I use this in between my cleanser and moisturizer. It helps get rid of any residue left behind by the face wash and soothes my skin before applying my oil free moisturizer. I'm for sure going to keep stocked up on this. And for such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Works great with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I usually have the type of skin that when everyone else says it worked on their sensitive skin it ends up damaging mine. This stuff is really gentle on my skin and I have had no issues so far and am half way through the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B

customer_reviews.title: A pretty decent toner—not the best for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really do much for me, but it’s okay. My skin type is dry. I can get eczema/flare ups. And I was hoping to find a toner that helps even out the red tones in my skin. This one doesn’t really leave me feeling moisturized or soothed. But it’s a good one if you need something basic. It smells really good! Not for me, but could be okay for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan J.

customer_reviews.title: It works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Its a very cooling feeling at first and im surprised at the amount of junk I was able to get off my face even after a shower and my cleanser.I also have very sensitive skin and am allergic to many things.With this I havent blown up though just a tad bit dry.Def need some extra moisturizer if you have normal skin and use it but its great for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Yates

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin , and it's been 3 years that I got rid of acne problems. This toner has triggered my acne issues again.. used 4 times and each time new acne popped up. It has strong smell, good one but seems like lots of chemicals. Would not recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Praneeth K Thaduvai

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not in the majority!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, sensitive skin and was happy to find a cheap toner for my skin type made by a brand that's lasted decades however I was not in the majority for this toner. After first use, it dried me out like the desert! Not even my intense creams could combat it quickly and it took about 3 to 4 days for my skin to go back to what it was! I'm glad for the people that had a great experience but I'm not one of them!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well for me
customer_reviews.text: It was to apply. Doesn't leave my skin feeling as taut as I'd like. However it was easy to apply. Has a nice scent. Didn't moisturizer my skin as well as I'd like. Best thing, it has a pleasant scent. Wouldn't buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Janice H.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on your skin
customer_reviews.text: light fragrance which is not overpowering. It doesn't dry out your skin. It is gentle on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S.

customer_reviews.title: Calming on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this toner from Neutrogena! It goes on my face very calming and doesn't burn at all! I am very allergic and this is the best toner for cleansing my skin!! I'll be purchasing more of this product! ❤❤
customer_reviews.author: pammy

customer_reviews.title: Well known brand
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve ever used a Neutrogena product that I didn’t like. This is definitely good for sensitive skin. I cannot say much about it’s moisturizing properties, as it is a toner and is meant to be a second step in cleansing. I always use a serum and lotion afterward. But it does not feel drying to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hated toners until I tried this
customer_reviews.text: So I have sensitive dry skin. Usually toners just make it more dry and it burns after using it,but I was in a good Mood and decided to try this one! Well well well,it does wonders! Not only It doesn’t make My skin dry it helps to keep it moist! Love the non irritating not too strong fresh scent too
customer_reviews.author: Dom Kve

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Works
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works and did an excellent job of clearing up my back completely, unlike other toners I’ve used. The smell is unimportant to me, the best of these things never smell good. This at least does not smell bad. Simply has a neutral smell, which is good, it doesn’t overpower my actual fragrances of choice.
customer_reviews.author: BMWilson

customer_reviews.title: Best skin toner I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Great skin toner for those middle aged and up because it doesn’t contain alcohol. I started using this product in my early forties because other toners were drying out my skin an making it age me. This Neutrogena alcohol free evenly tones your skin without drying it out and causing the appearance of dried out skin. It applies lightly and doesn’t feel like you have any product on your face. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for years. I have oily skin, despite being 50, and this clears the oil without overstripping. Leaves my skin feeling fresh and light.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking42

customer_reviews.title: Basic necessary item
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 4-5years. I am not sure about moisturizing part. I use this to wipe my face with cotton swipes after washing my face everyday morning and night. If I dont do this, I get acnes. I have combination skin type (break out before period). This is basic& necessary item that I recommend but doesnt moisturize probably.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: My product came unsealed and with a dark streak down the outside front of bottle on label! Idk what happen
customer_reviews.author: aerial brien cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toner!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amazing toner! This toner is great for sensitive skin. This is the only toner that I will use after a chemical peel or microdermabrasion because it wont sting my skin. It is very gentle yet cleans any residue off your skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ali112

customer_reviews.title: A good toner
customer_reviews.text: First week using it and it hasn't make me breakout, but leaves my combination skin feeling slightly oily after using it. Would prefer non-scented toner, but this was a budget friendly option for alcohol free toner so I'll stick with it unless it makes me break out.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: NO ALCOHOL
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product a number of years and find that the secret is after applying that you should wait until your face is totally dry and not mixed with make-up. NO ALCOHOL is a major PLUS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Special Needs Housing for Warriors/C McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Moisturising and cleans skin very well.
customer_reviews.text: I had just washed my face and I decided to try this toner so I applied it on my face with a cotton ball and I was amazed. There was still a lot of residue left on my face from the makeup and this toner is perfect to moisturize the skin and even out the skin tone. I highly recommend applying this to your face once or twice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Simran Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering smell!
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this away. The smell was so strong that I had to immediately wash it off. I ended up giving it to my boss who loves perfumes. I wouldn't recommend this for sensitive skin or sensitive noses.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T

customer_reviews.title: Loyal customer here
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 2 years ago and been stuck with it since. I love that the scent is not overpowering. It feels so light and doesn't sting at all. It also cleanses deeply. I just wish they have travel size.
customer_reviews.author: Lon

customer_reviews.title: Burns! May be bad for skin.
customer_reviews.text: Sodium chloride? For what?! Anyway, this toner BURNS my skin. I see from the reviews that most people seem to be unaffected in that way but for me it burns badly. Also I don’t like how it suds up like soap, makes me feel like I probably shouldn’t be leaving it to soak into my skin. It’s also perfumed, not a bad scent but smells like laundry detergent. I don’t find it moisturizing either. Idk, personally I really don’t like it and I’m worried it might actually be causing more harm than good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why does this product smell like old ladies?
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product not too long ago. I was excited to try alcohol-free toner that is less harsh on the skin. I expected a clean scent from a Neutrogena product. Not a strong perfume smell. Besides the scent, the alcohol-free toner did feel nice on my face. It didn't sting like most toners containing alcohol. It left my skin feeling pretty clean. I will probably look for an alcohol-free toner with no fragrance from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toner
customer_reviews.text: I found this toner at my local Walmart, and then was unable to find it again. it's now my favorite toner, truly helps with my skin as I have combo skin/dry skin, it's the most gentle toner I have found. it smells strongly of a clean smell, but it's manageable and after going through my first bottle, I don't smell that as much now and that's the one thing I don't like. Other than that? I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: monica j trabert

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! It came open though :(
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product a better review if it wasn’t for the fact that it came literally open... so I used it once and haven’t dared to use it again since I don’t know if anything got on it. On the other hand, it is a good product, I love the scent, it smells clean, and it’s not overpowering, it cleans and moisturizes the skin pretty great. However, you should keep a better eye on the packaging and making sure it does not come open like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin, removes all impurities
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily after removing my make up and after my shower. It remoisturizes my skin and gets rid of anything my facewash/makeup remover might have missed. My face never feels truly clean until I use this. It also helps control my blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: So, I actually really like this product. The only setback is when I started using it, it made me break out with whiteheads for some reason. It's not harsh at all and it's honestly moisturizing. I suspect my skin just needs to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks now and I’m starting to see the difference it makes on my skin. It’s not as red and my acne has gotten better. It smells nice to me, but it is a strong scent that maybe not everyone else would prefer. It doesn’t bother my sensitive skin and doesn’t dry it out. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sikorski

customer_reviews.title: Drying, break outs
customer_reviews.text: Really dried out my skin and made me break out a bit. When I gave it a break from my skin routine, my face cleared up and no more dryness. I gave it a second chance and the same thing again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I love it ((:
customer_reviews.text: Bro, I was kinda skeptical with buying this because the last toner I used gave me a bad rash (I had red cheeks for DAYS), My face was so itchy, it made me break out and I didn't even want to buy another one because of that bad experience...but THIS!!! THIS IS IT!!! I love the smell, my face started clearing up literally right after the first use. By the next morning, my acne had gone down tremendously and I love it. I will definetly buy again!!! ((: btw i have oily acne prone skin if u wanna try this out.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Now my makeup stays one longer and with less oil presence on my T zones! Very happy with the product. My skin type is mostly oily, but during winter months its combined.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toner for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for an affordable toner that does the trick to take off makeup and this is it. I have pretty sensitive skin and it hasn't broken me out either. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi P

customer_reviews.title: My skin is a lot nicer ever since I started using this
customer_reviews.text: The differences were noticeable immediately. About a day after I started using this, a lot of the blemishes on my face began to disappear. Prior to using this product, I had a decent amount of acne despite using a face cleanser. This is a great supplement to a cleanser for your skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This toner leaves a residue on your skin. I will not be purchasing again. It does have a faint scent but disappears after application.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke R.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It feels really great to use on my face after a scrub. This is the cheapest price I've found for it
customer_reviews.author: ER316

customer_reviews.title: Do not get it you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Not for sensitive skin. My face was clear but as soon as I used it my face started to get red then when I woke up in the morning I had broke out all over and my face was itchy. This is definitely not hypoallergenic. I’ve never had a reaction from a face product before until now. Also when it came there was no type of seal on the bottle it was just completely open. Some of the product even leaked out into the box.
customer_reviews.author: Laura mueller

customer_reviews.title: This thing is refreshing and smells perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am actually a huge fan of water like texture toner. I used to use that kind of toners when living in Korea. I didnt know what to replace my older toners when I moved to the States. But this thing is really similar to the ones I used and it is so refreshing!! I like how it feels as if it cleans up the dust and leftover makeups after I finish cleaning up my face with a cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Minhee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not good
customer_reviews.text: I always bought loreal toner. But this time try this one. It is not good compare loreal. Price is reasonable. So you don’t expect much from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Enkhee

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin friendly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my skin! Would definitely buy and I have been recommending this product to my family and friends. 5 star for this Alcohol free toner! Products with alcohol makes my skin dry and itchy. Thanks to this new found product that is friendly to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It’s a YES from the sensitive skin girl
customer_reviews.text: been using for a few days haven’t had any issues with my skin reacting badly it doesn’t have a scent or anything and my skin is very sensitive and does brake out easily so i’m honestly loving it for now, hopefully my skin stays loving it😂
customer_reviews.author: Kali and Nate

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Oil- and Alcohol-Free Facial Toner, Hypoallergenic Skin-Purifying Face Toner to Cleanse, Recondition and Purify Skin, Non-Comedogenic, Quick-Absorbing, 8.5 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
Help refresh your skin with Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Toner. This refreshing facial toner works to cleanse and tone without stripping skin of its natural moisture. The gentle formula of this oil-free toner contains mild purifiers that work to gently remove impurities and help recondition skin. This cleansing toner is also alcohol-free, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and quick absorbing so it won't clog pores as it leaves skin feeling fresh and clean without any dryness or stinging. Complete your daily skincare routine with this cleansing toner for an at-home self-care experience.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena
feature_bullets: 8.5-fluid ounce of Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Facial Toner to help purify, cleanse and refresh skin without stripping its natural moisture
This alcohol-free face toner is contains mild purifiers that work to gently remove impurities and help recondition skin. Plus it is non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores

The oil-free, hypoallergenic and alcohol-free formula of this gentle toner cleanses and refreshes skin without causing irritation or drying skin and will not strip delicate facial skin of its own natural moisture
Moisten cotton ball with Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Toner and apply to face with gentle upward strokes to leave skin feeling fresh and clean without any dryness or stinging
Complete your daily skincare routine with this cleansing face toner for your own at-home self-care experience
